summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Temaruco Clothing Factory. All redesigned pages (Landing, Custom Order, Contact, About, Boutique, POD) load correctly with new design system. Admin login works with provided credentials. Create Quote/Invoice button is visible and functional on AdminQuotesPage.

issues: Product images show placeholder text instead of actual images (e.g., 'Premium Cotton T-Shirt', 'Designer Polo Shirt' text visible in image area)

action_items: Consider adding actual product images to boutique products instead of placeholder text
context_for_next_testing_agent: All pages tested: Landing, Custom Order, Contact, About, Boutique, POD, Admin Login, Admin Quotes. Create Quote modal opens correctly with all form fields. WhatsApp button visible on all pages. Email notification system is MOCKED.

landing_page.details: Hero section, services grid, CTA section, trust indicators all display correctly

custom_order_page.details: Card-based design with form elements (order category, clothing name, quantity, fabric, colors, sizes, design details, customer info)

contact_page.details: Contact info (phone, email, Instagram, address), business hours, contact form all present

about_page.details: Our Story, Our Mission, Our Values sections with images and CTA

boutique_page.details: Products grid with 10 products, category links (Nigerian Traditional, Modern Wear), cart functionality

pod_page.details: 4-step flow (Select Item, Upload Design, Customize, Checkout) with clothing items

admin_login.details: Login with admin@temaruco.com / admin123 works correctly

admin_quotes_page.details: Create Quote/Invoice button visible and opens modal with all form fields

whatsapp_button.details: Visible in bottom right corner on all pages

mocked_apis.email_notifications: MOCKED - does not send real emails
